page.title: 04Customs
page.content: Every year the Provincial Mod is held in Portree.Some of the children from Kyleakin School go to the Mod and recite Gaelic poems and songs.Some of the people who go to the Provincial Mod get to go to the National Mod.The National Mod is held at a different city or town in Scotland every year. Most of the people who go to the Provincial Mod have to be taken by thier mum and dad.Each year we have different events that most of the village take part in.We have Ceilidhs in the Summer and once a year most of the people who live in Kyleakin go to stand and lay a wreath to the men who died in the War.
